Arm III : Patients receive standard antiemetic therapy serotonin receptor antagonist wear acustimulation wrist band ( portable transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulator ( TENS ) device ) continuously 5 consecutive day except necessary avoid immersion water . Patients may wear band either wrist , include alternate wrist desire , may adjust intensity stimulation optimum effectiveness . All patient complete questionnaire concern expectation nausea side effect prior receive chemotherapy cisplatin doxorubicin . Patients arm II III complete measure wrist band position .
